case.state: Hey, Mari! Hope you're ready for an exciting game, 'cuz it's always more fun with me around!
Heeeeere's Kora! Cute! Fierce! Fighting fit!
It's been a looooong time coming! Always cute and fierce, though!
There's orgies at this place!? This makes everything a heck of a lot more interesting!
Of course she's here! You're so predictable, Corgi.
Now it's a full party! Let's get this moving, everyone!
SQUID GAMES!!!
You want me to call you "Daddy"? Does that mean I get an allowance?
So many guys, and just little ole Kora? I'll show you why I'm fierce!
Only girls? Fine with me, we're all cute here! Let's see who has the most Girl Power!
There's only one guy here? Lucky you!
How'd you end up here, one lone guy surrounded by cute girls? Lucky dog!
Let's have a cheerful game, y'all!
Captain of the Breeze Shooters here! Let's have some fun!
It really is my time! Let's do it!
Think you can take me? We'll see. Let's have fun!
Can I get ~cards.text~ ~cards.ifplural(cards|card)~? Thanks a bunch!
Gimme ~cards.text~ ~cards.ifplural(cards|card)~!
I think ~cards.text~ ~cards.ifplural(cards|card)~ should do. Alright!
~Cards.text~ ~cards.ifplural(cards|card)~ should be great!
~Cards.text~ ~cards.ifplural(cards|card)~! That should do it!
~Cards.text~ ~cards.ifplural(cards|card)~? Yeah, ~cards.text~ ~cards.ifplural(cards|card)~ will do it.
I'm still in it! This hand proves it!
This hand's been a loooooong time coming!
Naked, but not afraid! My friends and I have pulled through worse.
Are we all on our last layer? This is exciting!
This is it for a lot of us! Don't be too mad when I beat one of you out though!
Just you and me! Guess this is what they call sudden death, right? Don't think it matters too much though, because my hand is completely awesome!
I don't wanna brag but... I think I got the best hand. No promises though!
Oh oh oh! I think mine's pretty awesome! Wait, am I supposed to say that out loud? Eh, I'm sure it's fine, right?
Hands like these are why I lead a team! Unless I lose. Then nevermind.
This hand is fierce! I like it!
This hand? Amazing! Awesome, even!
Ooooooh~! I really AM living my best life!
Heck yeah! These cards are great!
I almost feel bad for anyone who has to be on the short end of these cards, heh.
Boom, great cards!
This is hand is pretty meh. Let's see who wins!

Don't stare at me too hard, I get just the tiniest bit of embarrassed. All these blue glowy bits are part of my body, cuz I'm a Blade, y'know? Like a birthmark, but these actually serve purpose! The thing on my chest is my Core Crystal, and it's where I'll shrink back to if you all keep looking at me like that!
This is... alright. I guess.
I think this'll be fine.
Eh, should be... okay...
Are these cards any good?
Should I bring back a souvenir? Maybe some sweets? Does this place sell that kinda stuff? Wait, focus on the game, Kora!

Mediocre hand, whatever. Do you guys know what a Blade is? I think I've been getting some funny looks so I'll explain it nicely! Us Blades are like super cool, super awesome people that use Ether to make super cool, super awesome elemental powers! That totally answers it, right?
Will I ever recover from these cards?
I might be able to pull this off. Might.
On my last layer, a hand like this!? Really!?
...I can salvage this... right?
This really isn't all that bad... I think. Guess I'll know by the end of the round.
It's just you and me-- sudden death, y'know, and I'm not sure if I'll make it . Oh well, everything will be fun in the end!
What!? This hand blows!
This... isn't that bad, right?
Dealer...! This is so not fair...
Welp.
Oh this one sucks! Dealer, I wanted a good story, not for you to screw me over!
These cards are NOT cute!
Wow. Okay, Dealer, I'm not too mad, but, like... really?
Yep, these cards are fierce, alright. Fiercly bad.
Womp womp. Talk about embarassing cards.
Thinking... thinking... Yep, I'm screwed.
On my last layer? Really? Really really?
Kora's stay ingame may just be over...

Adventures? I've got a LOT of stories. One time, I was doing mercenary work, and- seriously, it was a job and a half. Cuz, uh, when we went to see the guy, there was another guy, and he was like "Hey! Do this other job!", so, we did, but when we got back, he was like, "It's free, right?", and we were like, "Nah-uh.", and he was all, "Aw man!". So he gave us the money, which to be honest, I wasn't even sure he was gonna do since he made such a big fuss about it, but we were attacked by, like, a lot of beasts! And I mean a LOT of beasts. Too many beasts! Us Blades can handle ourselves, but we're still a heck of a lot weaker without our Drivers. We managed to drive them off, but I think all the members of my group decided it was a bit too close. So yeah, that's the gist of it, though I'll always talk your ear off if ya want it!
I did NOT know that Fluttershy! Now how do I use this information...
Oooooo! I wanna know too!
Great question! Give us your best answer!
Ooh ooh ooh, it's definitely purple! I LOVE purple! Though maybe yellow works better with my electricity... Oh, and pink is a nice color as well... I think I just like a lot of colors.
Pets? Well, there's Boreas... On second thought, I don't think he counts. So no, no pets.
I think I'd go with Krabbles. They have super hard shells but they're genuinely adorable to look at! They're the animal version of being cute, fierce, and fighting fit!
I only stay up late when I have something to talk about and someone wants to listen! I always wanna talk to my Driver but she's always like "Nooooo, I'm begging you!" Her loss, though, I'd say!
Plants? I don't usually look for any ol' plants-- or at least not for myself. I try to find some for my friend Vale, but they're never the ones she's looking for.
Plants? Flowers count, right? Pretty little plants are always so refreshing to look at! They're a massive boost to my Girl Power!
Oh, that sounds pretty fun! I'm not good at those kinds of things, but I'll try and tell my friends back at home about it.
Whoa, that's a cool deal! Hope you won't regret bringing it up later, though.
Wait, you don't use Ether to use magic!? That's crazy, considering I can still feel it here in the Inventory!
Your singing voice is AWESOME, Miku! I definitely wanna hear more!
...Y'know, I kinda feel naked without my bolts. That's the point of the game, I know, but it's not a good naked. I'll get over it.

So, why are you all here? Wait-- I guess it's to strip, huh? Ok, I'll think of a better question, and when I do, please please {i} pleeease{!reset} tell! I just want to tell the best story possible while I'm here, and, well, I kinda need someone to spill!
So, anyone hear any rumors? I'd love any sort of gossip you throw at me! It's really my thing, trust me!
We've definitely reached peak awesomeness! I can see so many privates!
Funny futa Easter egg from Onboro lmao
I wonder if Pyra is gonna cook today... Guess I can just ask, as long as Mythra isn't around...
This is so different from what I usally do. I kinda like it! I get to show off all my super cute and fierce points that no one sees!
Our cast here is pretty interesting, I'd say! Like, I only know ~player~'s name! I totally wanna know more about ~human.ifMale(him|her)~!
I wonder how many other Blades came to the Inventory... I think Pyra told me Mythra came once.
I'm not really, like, super smart or anything, but I kinda wonder if it helps here. Though being smarter probably doesn't make you any luckier, right?
I can feel a lot more eyes on my chest than usual. And somehow I don't think they're looking at my Core Crystal...
I've gotta say, the Inventory is a great boost for Girl Power! Way better than a crusty old inn, though I probably wouldn't wanna sleep here...
Yep, they are! Just one of the signs that I'm 100% a certified, awesome Blade! You've got a nice sense of style yourself, Heris! I bet the kind of science you do is super duper cool!

Prying? Pfft, I'm happy to talk about myself! I dunno too much about moon rocks, but it's definitely a powerful crystal! My Core Crystal, to be completely accurate! You can think of it like... my heart. My big, shiny heart!
Being so upbeat is just a part of my super cute and fierce nature! If I was super down all the time, I'd prune like a... prune.
Thanks! I love your outfit too! I've seen lots of cute outfits from all parts of Alrest, but you just scream "super cute, super fierce"!
Yep! Every inch of Girl Power you see on me is 100% Core Crystal!

I mean, I get a little nervous and embarassed when it gets to my turn, but can't let that stop me! I've done embarrassing things before, and I always thought I've just gotta take it! That's how you get fierce, y'know?

Well, I do get a bit lazy when I'm just waking up-- actually, not important. It's good to be pumped, don't you think? Can't go out totally bummed! Oh, and it's totally great for Girl Power too! Not every girl needs to smile, but I think it goes a long way for me!
So much for a perfect game. Oh well, I'll strip!
I almost thought I could get out this place unscathed! Let's start with something small.
First loss! Can't win without stripping something, I guess!
I'm still ahead some! I can win this!
Don't think I'm out yet! I've still got more to take off!
I may have lost, but I'm still winning! Off with the skirt!
This is too much fun! Winning and watching people strip is great, even if I lose a little! Let me show you all something cool in return! Blink and you'll miss it!
Another loss? That's okay, I'm still OWNING it right now! Now, watch me own a Blade specialty! Keep your eyes peeled!
I've lost this round, but I'm still ahead! I think I'll show you a little Blade magic in return! Don't look away!
Winning is nice, but I'm glad I've gotta strip now! Stories are better with a little conflict, y'know!
I guess the cards were against me! Let's get the rest of my outfit off...
I lost? Oh well, a lead's a lead, and I've got a one-piece to take off!
I think I'm still winning! No amount of loss is gonna get me down!
So little left, but I'm still in the lead! Don't get cocky!
Guess even winners have minor losses, huh? That's why I'm way more than ready!
Hehe! Guess I'm not winning much anymore, huh? Even the winner has to take off {i} everything! {!reset}
I lost? Guess the playing field is even now. Exciting!
This is intense! I really am having lots of fun, even if I just lost my lead!
The first loss! ...Like the very first loss! I should probably be a little more careful.
I lost first? Guess we can start off with a bang!
Another loss! We're starting to get spicy in here!
Okay, okay! I've lost this time! I think I can do better next round!
Alright, now we're talking! I'll take off something bigger this time, I promise!
I lose? Welp, the skirt's off, then!
My second loss! I'm not too down about it, it's actually pretty fun so far!
Alright, I lost! Let me show you guys a Blade specialty!
Blades always have tricks up their sleeves, even at silly little strip poker games. I'll show you all mine!
Hehe, I lose! Guess I'll show off a bit! Don't blink!
Oh well, can't win every hand. I'll strip-- Blade style!
Oh, I have to strip? Blink and you'll miss this one!
I'm up again? Time to get the rest of this off then... You know the drill.
We all know what this means. Try not to look away!
Welp, it's been a long time coming! Let's get the rest of my outfit off.
Alright, alright. Leave the rest to me!
I'm up? 'Kay! Let's just get the rest of this off.
Oh, I'm up! And this is my last thing! How tense!
Exciting business here! Alright, heels are coming off!
Well, would you look at that? I'll just be naked after this.
Hehe, guess I'll be fully in the nude, huh?
And now, the heels will be gone! I'm so close to losing this heartracing game!
Y'know, I would've thought that I'm at the perfect state, but if I've gotta strip, I've gotta.
Round's over! I actually have no more tricks, so I'll be doing it the normal way this time.
Guess y'all's hands were better. No worries, Kora is on the move!
Suppose I lost, huh? Alright, I've still got a little more to take off!
That's what I call unlucky. Not gonna lie, I liked having only the gloves and heels on, but rules ARE rules!
Alright, my first loss this game! Let's keep this pace, alright?
Guess I'm up! Hehe, I'm all giddy with excitement and I haven't even done anything yet!
I'm the loser this round! We're just getting started, though!
Guess it's my turn! Stripping is the name of the game, after all!
I lost? Alright, let's start with something small...
Whoa, is it really my turn? Heck yeah I'll do it!
The first loss! ...Like the very first loss! I should probably be a little more careful.
I lost first? Guess we can start off with a bang!
Alright, first item! I'm already losing a bit, but that's okay in my book!
I lost AND I'm losing overall? Didn't know the first round of strip poker could be so brutal!
Wow, I lose once and I'm already behind? Guess you guys came in extra prepared!
Okay, I've lost the hand! Let's start off with something small!
Is it my turn? Alright, gimme a sec...
I may be losing, but don't forget: everyone loves a comeback story!
At the rate I'm going... Nah, I'm not out yet! There's always a chance!
Heh, I'm about to lose the game entirely. Don't get cocky though! I can always come back!
Wow, rough game so far! Let's hope I turn it around!
Does fun come at the cost of losing? 'Cuz I'm not doing the best, but I am absolutely ecstatic!
Wow, I lost! Okay, skirt's off!
I'm losing? Like, in general? Gee, I didn't think I'd be this bad at this.
I'm losing, and that sucks and all, but this is all still so exciting!
I've gotta strip? Leave it to Kora!
Stripping time! I may be pretty down, but I won't let it get to me-- well, not too much, anyway!
Compared to you guys, I don't have a lot on me right now. But I think I can turn it around with a simple trick of mine...
Let me show you guys something neat! Don't get too distracted by it-- or do, I'm pretty behind and I'd like to catch up!
Oh, I'm losing? Guess I have no choice but to show my Ultimate move! ...I'm just messing with ya'll, I'd do it even if I was winning and I can do cooler things-- but keep your eyes peeled anyway!
Blink and you'll miss cool Blade action!
Okay, ya'll! I think it's time to show off a little-- in more ways than one!
I'm losing, tits out, and I've still gotta strip more? You guys want a lot from fiercest girl girl here, huh?
I'm losing, tits out, and I've still gotta strip more? You guys want a lot from cutest girl girl here, huh?
Don't get too cocky! Just cuz I'm losing doesn't mean I can't pull out something to surprise you guys!
To distract myself from me losing, let's use a little more Blade power to get the rest of my outfit off. A good deal, right?
You guys wanna see more of Kora? Alrighty then, just don't look away!
I have no more tricks to share, so you guys will just have to accept the normal way.
I'm almost out already! Strip poker is cruel to the unlucky!
It's my time again! Don't get your hopes up too high though, I'm all outta tricks-- unless you've got a thing for a girl's bare arms, anyway.
I've got the least amount of clothes on? Guess you guys weren't too distracted by my powers, huh?
No use sulking over a loss! Well, not too much anyway!
Of course I've got friends! Big friends, small friends, cute friends, fierce friends! I've got lots of friends! A lot of them tell me I'm kinda noisy, but I have no idea what they're talking about!

Well, Blades are like any other person, except we come from Core Crystals. Oh, but that only happens when we're awoken by a Driver-- like, special people with that kind of potential. We all explode out like "whoooosh!" from our Core Crystals, and then you're stuck with someone like me!
These things just pop right off. Watch.
Just give me a second here. Like literally a second, these aren't hard to get off. Though I guess it wouldn't be {i} literally {!reset} a second, but like, you get the point.
This won't take long.
Here it comes!
Let's get this party started!
THIS is the power of a Blade!
The skirt's a bit harder to take off-- not like sliding it off is too difficult though!
Just a sec, this thing's got some fight in it.
...Past my butt and into my hand you go.
Just roll it down and eventually I'll get to the heels...
Let me get this off quickly-- I might lose my balance in a second...
Soon I'll be the naked girl I assume most of you came here for!
Oh, the bracelets. These big ol' things. They look harder to take off, but they really aren't. Oh, and the gloves are coming off too, don't worry!
Let me just get these bracelets off first, and then these gloves will come right off.
Some may ask, "But Kora! Why not take the bracelets off seperately?", and I say that it isn't as fun if I have to take off every little thing! Hey, ~player~, you agree, right?
Here we go again!
{i} Heeeeeeere's Kora! {!reset}
Can I blow your mind again? Let's find out!
Well, it's definitely the easiest. It comes off in the front too, but it's waaaay easier to just make half of it disappear! I also just won't lose it...
Hehe, don't worry, they'll come off. Easily too! It's good to have a little fun is all!
Forget? Me? Never! Well, there was that one time-- no, that's not important. I just wanna look sexy is all, hehe!
Thanks, Estelle! I can't speak for every Blade, but it's definitely way more fun this way!
Oh, but Estelle! You're pretty nice too! How's your friend situation like?
Ok, I wasn't paying too much attention but I'm sure everyone was like, "Wow, Kora, that was awesome! It was even better the second time!"
Whew! That was cool, wasn't it?
I definitely nailed it here!
Wha-bam! Skirt off!
Alright, it's off. Let's continue, 'kay?
Hips out! Don't go too crazy over just that, 'kay?
How was it? An exciting reveal, right!?
How was it? A 10/10 I hope!
A spectacular performance if I do say so myself! Oh, and I say so!
Tada! Kora at her most primal, for everyone to see! Good enough to write about, right?
Hehe, here I am! Think this is my ultimate form?
Get an eyeful, 'cuz I'm now in the nude! Fully too!

Y'know, talking my glove off like this reminds me of something. One time I was doing Sheba's makeup, cuz she asked right? Everything was fine, until I dropped something in her bathtub that she's always in. And I really mean always. Like, the tub flies and everything and she's quite literally always bathing. I don't think I've every seen her without it. So anyway, my makeup in there and I have to reach in there and get it while Sheba is worrying that I ruined her bath water. So I take off my glove and go in. I got it, but I saw her making a weird smirk when I was reaching. Makes me wonder if maybe she could, like, feel the water or something and I was touching her somewhere I shouldn't. Or maybe my boobs were just spilling, I dunno.
The gloves just came off! Oh, that's not me being upset or anything, I mean I literally just took off my gloves. Hope there wasn't any confusion on that part.
Not gonna lie, these gloves are super comfy. Sad to 'em go, but a deal's a deal!
Well, that was easy! Let's keep going!
Babam! Kora is ready to roll!
That wasn't hard at all! I wanna play more, so let's start the next round already!
Woohoo, someone other than me lost! ~name~ should start removing the big stuff!
Hehe, now that's what I'm talking about! Hey, ~name~, join me in nudity!
Woohoo, a guy gets to strip for me! Choose something great!
Oh, so ~name~ lost? Not me? Not that I thought I was gonna lose anyway, just-- y'know what, I'll just let him do his thing.
I almost feel bad for you, ~name~. Almost. This stripping game can be rough but it's definitely rewarding for everyone involved!
This could be good. Hope ~name~ lives up to my hopes!
Woot woot! Time to strip ~name~!
It's a guys turn! Surely he can make this worthwhile!
Whoa-ho, looks like it's your turn, ~name~! Watcha gonna take off?
Ah, boys will be boys and losers will be losers, but this time our loser is a boy! I have no idea where I'm going with this, so please strip something off already!
O-oh, you're ~name~? Mmm, show me a guy's charm...
Haah, you're up, ~name~... Got anything, ah, good for me?
You c-could really be helping me out here depending on, mmm, what you take off, ~name~...
Language! Nah I'm kidding, say naughty words all ya want, I won't judge!
Okay, whoever is drawing ANYONE like that have GOT to show me. That's way too incredible NOT to!
Sorry girl, but looks like you're up! Don't feel intimidated!
Can ~name~ show us her Girl Power? Trick question! Of course she can!
I think I'm doing pretty well so far! Oh, but I shouldn't be talking about myself right now, huh? ~name~ lost, so let's focus on them! Take off something good! Pretty please!
Okay, ~name~! Take whatever off with a bang! And maybe a kapow! Ooooh! Or maybe a hwacha!
Y'know, I may not be Sheba, but I do still have an affinity for girls. Can you show us something nice?
Woohoo! ~name~'s gonna strip for us! This'll be good I hope!
Oooooooh, ~name~, got something good for us?
Hey, ~name~, if I hype you up, will you take something good off? Goooooooooooooo ~name~! Wooo!
A-ah, it's ~name~'s turn? Mmm, show me your Girl Power...
Haah, you're up, ~name~... Got anything, ah, good for me?
You c-could really be helping me out here depending on, mmm, what you take off, ~name~...
A tie!? That has to be like a 1 in a bajillion chance!
I didn't think about guys having small items on them, mainly just girls. Would you say you care for being fashionable, ~name~?
Oh, so the ~clothing~! Was wondering if you were gonna take ~clothing.ifPlural(those|that)~ off.
Only the ~clothing~? A bit lame, but we're progressing!
I'm hanging loose and you're just now taking off the ~clothing~, ~name~? C'mon, be a little considerate!
Ahh, boo! When's the better stuff being taken off, ~name~!?
A small item? I mean, whatever, we're moving along.
J-just the ~clothing~? ...Not helpful...
Oh, I thought... ah, nevermind...
You're just full of surprises! Two pairs of underwear!? If I wore underwear in the first place, I'd totally kick my self for not thinking about that!
Let's just move on.
Surely we'll get something better next round, right?
Next round, please!
We'll whittle you down, ~name~. From cards to just standing around being sexy, we'll get you to take something big off!
When you take off something good, ~name~, I'll rejoice. 'Til then: booo!
Maybe we'll have more fun next round.
Ngh, I'll just go on without proper sustance. Thanks ~name~!
Y-you'll take off something better next time, right? Ah...
*gasp* What a tease! Devilish behavior!
Whoa, ghost friend! Er, it is a friend, right?
Oh, Nami, you dropped something.
You still have little things to take off after showing your tits? Wild choice!
Whoa, you're practically naked and you still wanna take off small things? Anything to not lose, I guess!
You think there's enough chests out in the field or something? Don't be shy, I don't have a monoply on bare boobs.
It's hard to think of a good story when your opponents only take off little things! Have a heart, ~name~!
I'll be honest, I lost a bit of patience taking off my own clothes. That being said, you should {i} totally{!reset} come down to my level!
Teeny tiny things give teeny tiny satisfaction! Guess you've gotta lose more to see good stuff from you.
Even just losing the small things means we'll see bigger things later. I can wait.
Well, if ~name~ is just gonna take off something small, I guess it's still better than me myself losing. So thanks anyway, ~name~!
Y-you'll take off something better next time, right? Ah...
Aw, help a girl out, why don't you? Nn...
We'll see bigger things from ~name~ later, I suppose. I can hardly wait.
Just the ~clothing~? I guess that saves me from losing, so I'll allow it this time, ~name~!
A small step toward greatness! Still a little disappointing that you're only taking off the ~clothing~, but I'll work with it!
Great change! An exposed midrriff like that is the perfect way to show off your cute side!
Well, my clothes kinda just disappear. I don't have any reason to just let them stick around, so they go poof!
Ooooh, this reminds me of how my friends also had a large bounty on their heads at one point! You seem super nice, so I'll trust that you're not a bad guy for the time being, okay?
Moving right along!
Let's just start the next round.
Dealer, start shuffling that deck!
The fun'll start sometime soon, I bet!
~name~'s just gotta get taken down some more is all! Good luck, you're gonna need it, girl!
Keep it going!
Well, that wasn't fruiful.
Mmm, maybe the thought of ~name~ taking off the bigger things would help...
Now THIS is what the Inventory was made for! Keep at it, ~name~!
That's the stuff! This is starting to get real exciting!
Oh? The ~clothing~? Now we're talkin'!
We're getting just a little bit closer to being on equal terms. Hope you're ready, ~name~!
Hey, so about your ~clothing~: do most guys wear that kinda thing where you came from? It looks nice!
~Clothing~'s coming off! ~name~, you're doing great!
...~Clothing~? Nn, keep it coming, ~name~...
Oho, we're, mm, getting somewhere!
Hey, ~name~, you're good, right? If you're ready, we're ready!
Now that your ~clothing~ ~clothing.ifPlural(are|is)~ is off, ~name~, we should try to get you to lose more hands. You'd be a great addition to my story!
Don't start sweating, now, ~name~! We're just getting started!
~Clothing~? Off. ~name~? Just a little more naked than before! Next round? About to start!
The next round should be even more awesome! Right, ~name~?
I wanna see more of ~name~. Next round please!
Ah, just seeing more of ~name~ helps a lot!
H-how about we continue? Nnn, I wanna see more...
I'd totally just zap 'em! Hit 'em with a "zing", and they'd totally just go "kerplow"!
Aha, we're getting a little spicy here! Even just taking off the ~clothing~ is a bit lewd, don't ya think, ~player~?
Just a little bit of ~name~ gets us a little bit closer to seeing a lot... bit of... ~name~. I flubbed that sentence but go ~name~, woot woot!
The ~clothing~ ~clothing.ifPlural(are|is)~ coming off! Glad to see something somewhat big come off you!
~name~, before you take your ~clothing~ off, I just wanna say that ~clothing.ifPlural(they're|it's)~ super cute!
~name~, it's a bit sad to see your ~clothing~ go, but I think you'll look better without ~clothing.ifPlural(them|it)~.
The ~clothing~ ~clothing.ifPlural(are|is)~ coming off! ~name~, you're doing great!
...~Clothing~? Nn, keep it coming, ~name~...
Oho, we're-- ah, getting somewhere!
Careful, ~name~, you're getting closer to nudity!
~name~, before we start the next round-- you're okay, right? Just checking! Girls should look out for each other!
We're getting somewhere~! ~name~ will deliver even better stuff next time, I bet!
Hehe, careful, ~name~! Not saying I want you to lose but I really, really, REALLY would like to see you naked!
T-This'll help some... Thanks.
Mm, I'll savor this.
Now that your ~clothing~ ~clothing.ifPlural(are|is)~ off, ~name~, we should try to get you to lose more hands. You'd be a great addition to my story!
Hehe, next round please! We've gotta see more of ~name~ and everyone else after all!
Don't you worry, ~name~! We're just getting started!
~Clothing~? Yours? Now? These rounds are getting better and better!
This was one of the bigger things I was waiting for! This is totally the ultimate strip poker experience!
Woohoo! Skin! ...In any other context, you probably shouldn't trust anyone who says that!
Mm, this is lovely...
The ~clothing~? T-thanks a bunch, ngh!
~name~ is onto the ~clothing~ now? Alright, I've been waiting for something like this from them!
Oho, a boy is stripping something like this off in front of me? The Inventory is a great place!
